text: Ferrari World Abu Dhabi is an amusement park in Abu Dhabi United Arab Emirates that is themed on Ferrari cars. The largely indoor park has five roller coasters including Formula Rossa, the fastest in the world. There's also a 400 metre zip-line, roof walk attraction, drop tower, tea cup style ride, etc. Category:Theme parks in Asia Category:Abu Dhabi (emirate) Category:Buildings and structures in the United Arab Emirates
title: Ferrari World Abu Dhabi
